name: Golden Reishi
description: Golden Reishi (Ganoderma curtisii), also called Yellow Reishi, is a medicinal mushroom from North America that is very similar to the well-known Ganoderma lucidum (Reishi) and possesses the same medicinal properties. It grows on decaying stumps and roots of hardwoods. The species produces polysaccharides and triterpenoids with a broad spectrum of biological activities.
